# 依照此範例長出的 SQL
``` sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "__EFMigrationsHistory" (
    "MigrationId" character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    "ProductVersion" character varying(32) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK___EFMigrationsHistory" PRIMARY KEY ("MigrationId")
);

START TRANSACTION;

CREATE TABLE "Person" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Name" varchar(30) NOT NULL,
    "BirthDate" timestamp NOT NULL,
    "CreateTime" timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (NOW()),
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Person" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "Person" IS 'This is a person table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "Person"."Name" IS 'This is a person name';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "Person"."BirthDate" IS 'This is a person birth date';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "Person"."CreateTime" IS 'This is a create time';

INSERT INTO "Person" ("Id", "BirthDate", "Name")
VALUES (1, TIMESTAMP '2000-01-01 00:00:00', 'John');
INSERT INTO "Person" ("Id", "BirthDate", "Name")
VALUES (2, TIMESTAMP '2001-02-02 00:00:00', 'Mary');

SELECT setval(
    pg_get_serial_sequence('"Person"', 'Id'),
    GREATEST(
        (SELECT MAX("Id") FROM "Person") + 1,
        nextval(pg_get_serial_sequence('"Person"', 'Id'))),
    false);

INSERT INTO "__EFMigrationsHistory" ("MigrationId", "ProductVersion")
VALUES ('20241106021632_InitialCreate', '7.0.20');

COMMIT;
```
